34 // Forward declaration
35 template <typename, typename>
36 class DistArray;

38 namespace expressions {
39 
40 // Forward declaration
41 template <typename, bool>
42 class BlkTsrExpr;
43 template <typename, typename>
44 class ScalBlkTsrExpr;
45 template <typename, typename, bool>
46 class BlkTsrEngine;
47 template <typename, typename, typename>
48 class ScalBlkTsrEngine;
49 
50 template <typename Tile, typename Policy, typename Result, bool Alias>
51 struct EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine<DistArray<Tile, Policy>, Result, Alias> > {
52  // Argument typedefs
53  typedef DistArray<Tile, Policy> array_type;
54 
55  // Operational typedefs
56  typedef
57  typename TiledArray::detail::scalar_type<DistArray<Tile, Policy> >::type
58  scalar_type;
59  typedef TiledArray::detail::Shift<
60  Result,
61  typename TiledArray::eval_trait<typename array_type::value_type>::type,
62  (!Alias) || TiledArray::eval_trait<
63  typename array_type::value_type>::is_consumable>
64  op_base_type;
65  typedef TiledArray::detail::UnaryWrapper<op_base_type>
66  op_type;
67  typedef TiledArray::detail::LazyArrayTile<typename array_type::value_type,
68  op_type>
69  value_type;
70  typedef typename eval_trait<value_type>::type
71  eval_type;
72  typedef Policy policy;
73  typedef TiledArray::detail::DistEval<value_type, policy>
74  dist_eval_type;
75 
76  // Meta data typedefs
77  typedef typename policy::size_type size_type;
78  typedef typename policy::trange_type trange_type;
79  typedef typename policy::shape_type shape_type;
80  typedef typename policy::pmap_interface
81  pmap_interface;
82 
83  static constexpr bool consumable = true;
84  static constexpr unsigned int leaves = 1;
85 };
86 
87 template <typename Tile, typename Policy, typename Scalar, typename Result>
88 struct EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine<DistArray<Tile, Policy>, Scalar, Result> > {
89  // Argument typedefs
90  typedef DistArray<Tile, Policy> array_type;
91 
92  // Operational typedefs
93  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
94  typedef TiledArray::detail::ScalShift<
95  Result,
96  typename TiledArray::eval_trait<typename array_type::value_type>::type,
97  scalar_type,
98  TiledArray::eval_trait<typename array_type::value_type>::is_consumable>
99  op_base_type;
100  typedef TiledArray::detail::UnaryWrapper<op_base_type>
101  op_type;
102  typedef TiledArray::detail::LazyArrayTile<typename array_type::value_type,
103  op_type>
104  value_type;
105  typedef typename eval_trait<value_type>::type
106  eval_type;
107  typedef Policy policy;
108  typedef TiledArray::detail::DistEval<value_type, policy>
109  dist_eval_type;
110 
111  // Meta data typedefs
112  typedef typename policy::size_type size_type;
113  typedef typename policy::trange_type trange_type;
114  typedef typename policy::shape_type shape_type;
115  typedef typename policy::pmap_interface
116  pmap_interface;
117 
118  static constexpr bool consumable = true;
119  static constexpr unsigned int leaves = 1;
120 };

125 template <typename Derived>
126 class BlkTsrEngineBase : public LeafEngine<Derived> {
127  public:
128  // Class hierarchy typedefs
129  typedef BlkTsrEngineBase<Derived> BlkTsrEngineBase_;
130  typedef LeafEngine<Derived> LeafEngine_;
131  typedef typename LeafEngine_::ExprEngine_
132  ExprEngine_;
133 
134  // Argument typedefs
135  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::array_type
136  array_type;
137 
138  // Operational typedefs
139  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::value_type
140  value_type;
141  typedef
142  typename EngineTrait<Derived>::op_type op_type;
143  typedef
144  typename EngineTrait<Derived>::policy policy;
145  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::dist_eval_type
146  dist_eval_type;
147 
148  // Meta data typedefs
149  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::size_type size_type;
150  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::trange_type
151  trange_type;
152  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::shape_type
153  shape_type;
154  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::pmap_interface
155  pmap_interface;
156 
157  protected:
158  // Import base class variables to this scope
159  using ExprEngine_::perm_;
160  using ExprEngine_::permute_tiles_;
161  using ExprEngine_::pmap_;
162  using ExprEngine_::shape_;
163  using ExprEngine_::trange_;
164  using ExprEngine_::vars_;
165  using ExprEngine_::world_;
166  using LeafEngine_::array_;
167 
168  std::vector<std::size_t> lower_bound_;
169  std::vector<std::size_t> upper_bound_;
170 
171  public:
172  template <typename Array, bool Alias>
173  BlkTsrEngineBase(const BlkTsrExpr<Array, Alias>& expr)
174  : LeafEngine_(expr),
175  lower_bound_(expr.lower_bound()),
176  upper_bound_(expr.upper_bound()) {}
177 
178  template <typename Array, typename Scalar>
179  BlkTsrEngineBase(const ScalBlkTsrExpr<Array, Scalar>& expr)
180  : LeafEngine_(expr),
181  lower_bound_(expr.lower_bound()),
182  upper_bound_(expr.upper_bound()) {}
183 
185 
187  trange_type make_trange() const {
188  const unsigned int rank = array_.trange().tiles_range().rank();
189 
190  std::vector<TiledRange1> trange_data;
191  trange_data.reserve(rank);
192  std::vector<std::size_t> trange1_data;
193 
194  // Get temporary data pointers
195  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const trange = array_.trange().data().data();
196  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = lower_bound_.data();
197  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = upper_bound_.data();
198 
199  for (unsigned int d = 0u; d < rank; ++d) {
200  // Copy the tiling for the block
201  const auto lower_d = lower[d];
202  const auto upper_d = upper[d];
203 
204  // Copy and shift the tiling for the block
205  auto i = lower_d;
206  const auto base_d = trange[d].tile(i).first;
207  trange1_data.emplace_back(0ul);
208  for (; i < upper_d; ++i)
209  trange1_data.emplace_back(trange[d].tile(i).second - base_d);
210 
211  // Add the trange1 to the tiled range data
212  trange_data.emplace_back(trange1_data.begin(), trange1_data.end());
213  trange1_data.resize(0ul);
214  }
215 
216  return TiledRange(trange_data.begin(), trange_data.end());
217  }
218 
220 
222  trange_type make_trange(const Permutation& perm) const {
223  const unsigned int rank = array_.trange().tiles_range().rank();
224 
225  std::vector<TiledRange1> trange_data;
226  trange_data.reserve(rank);
227  std::vector<std::size_t> trange1_data;
228 
229  // Get temporary data pointers
230  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const trange = array_.trange().data().data();
231  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = lower_bound_.data();
232  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = upper_bound_.data();
233 
234  // Construct the inverse permutation
235  const Permutation inv_perm = -perm;
236  for (unsigned int d = 0u; d < rank; ++d) {
237  const auto inv_perm_d = inv_perm[d];
238 
239  // Copy the tiling for the block
240  const auto lower_i = lower[inv_perm_d];
241  const auto upper_i = upper[inv_perm_d];
242 
243  // Copy, shift, and permute the tiling of the block
244  auto i = lower_i;
245  const auto base_d = trange[inv_perm_d].tile(i).first;
246  trange1_data.emplace_back(0ul);
247  for (; i < upper_i; ++i)
248  trange1_data.emplace_back(trange[inv_perm_d].tile(i).second - base_d);
249 
250  // Add the trange1 to the tiled range data
251  trange_data.emplace_back(trange1_data.begin(), trange1_data.end());
252  trange1_data.resize(0ul);
253  }
254 
255  return TiledRange(trange_data.begin(), trange_data.end());
256  }
257 
258  void init_distribution(World* world,
259  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap) {
260  ExprEngine_::init_distribution(
261  world,
262  (pmap ? pmap
263  : policy::default_pmap(*world, trange_.tiles_range().volume())));
264  }
265 
267  dist_eval_type make_dist_eval() const {
268  // Define the distributed evaluator implementation type
269  typedef TiledArray::detail::ArrayEvalImpl<array_type, op_type, policy>
270  impl_type;
271 
273  std::shared_ptr<impl_type> pimpl = std::make_shared<impl_type>(
274  array_, *world_, trange_, shape_, pmap_, perm_, ExprEngine_::make_op(),
275  lower_bound_, upper_bound_);
276 
277  return dist_eval_type(pimpl);
278  }
279 
281 
283  std::string make_tag() const {
284  std::stringstream ss;
285  ss << "[Block ";
286  TiledArray::detail::print_array(ss, lower_bound_);
287  ss << " - ";
288  TiledArray::detail::print_array(ss, upper_bound_);
289  ss << "] ";
290  return ss.str();
291  }
292 
293 }; // class BlkTsrEngineBase

301 template <typename Array, typename Result, bool Alias>
302 class BlkTsrEngine
303  : public BlkTsrEngineBase<BlkTsrEngine<Array, Result, Alias> > {
304  public:
305  // Class hierarchy typedefs
306  typedef BlkTsrEngine<Array, Result, Alias>
307  BlkTsrEngine_;
308  typedef BlkTsrEngineBase<BlkTsrEngine_>
309  BlkTsrEngineBase_;
310  typedef typename BlkTsrEngineBase_::LeafEngine_
311  LeafEngine_;
312  typedef typename LeafEngine_::ExprEngine_
313  ExprEngine_;
314 
315  // Argument typedefs
316  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::array_type
317  array_type;
318 
319  // Operational typedefs
320  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::value_type
321  value_type;
322  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::op_base_type
323  op_base_type;
324  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::op_type
325  op_type;
326  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::policy
327  policy;
328  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::dist_eval_type
329  dist_eval_type;
330 
331  // Meta data typedefs
332  typedef
333  typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::size_type size_type;
334  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::trange_type
335  trange_type;
336  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::shape_type
337  shape_type;
338  typedef typename EngineTrait<BlkTsrEngine_>::pmap_interface
339  pmap_interface;
340 
341  protected:
342  // Import base class variables to this scope
343  using BlkTsrEngineBase_::lower_bound_;
344  using BlkTsrEngineBase_::upper_bound_;
345  using ExprEngine_::perm_;
346  using ExprEngine_::permute_tiles_;
347  using ExprEngine_::pmap_;
348  using ExprEngine_::shape_;
349  using ExprEngine_::trange_;
350  using ExprEngine_::vars_;
351  using ExprEngine_::world_;
352  using LeafEngine_::array_;
353 
354  public:
355  template <typename A>
356  BlkTsrEngine(const BlkTsrExpr<A, Alias>& expr) : BlkTsrEngineBase_(expr) {}
357 
359 
361  shape_type make_shape() {
362  return array_.shape().block(lower_bound_, upper_bound_);
363  }
364 
366 
369  shape_type make_shape(const Permutation& perm) {
370  return array_.shape().block(lower_bound_, upper_bound_, perm);
371  }
372 
374 
376  op_type make_tile_op() const {
377  const unsigned int rank = trange_.tiles_range().rank();
378 
379  // Construct and allocate memory for the shift range
380  std::vector<long> range_shift;
381  range_shift.reserve(rank);
382 
383  // Get temporary data pointers
384  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const trange = array_.trange().data().data();
385  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = lower_bound_.data();
386 
387  // Initialize the range shift vector
388  for (unsigned int d = 0u; d < rank; ++d) {
389  const auto lower_d = lower[d];
390  const auto base_d = trange[d].tile(lower_d).first;
391  range_shift.emplace_back(-base_d);
392  }
393 
394  return op_type(op_base_type(range_shift));
395  }
396 
398 
401  op_type make_tile_op(const Permutation& perm) const {
402  const unsigned int rank = trange_.tiles_range().rank();
403 
404  // Construct and allocate memory for the shift range
405  std::vector<long> range_shift(rank, 0l);
406 
407  // Get temporary data pointers
408  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const trange = array_.trange().data().data();
409  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = lower_bound_.data();
410 
411  // Initialize the permuted range shift vector
412  for (unsigned int d = 0u; d < rank; ++d) {
413  const auto perm_d = perm[d];
414  const auto lower_d = lower[d];
415  const auto base_d = trange[d].tile(lower_d).first;
416  range_shift[perm_d] = -base_d;
417  }
418 
419  return op_type(op_base_type(range_shift), perm);
420  }
421 
423 
425  std::string make_tag() const {
426  std::stringstream ss;
427  ss << "[block] ";
428  return BlkTsrEngineBase_::make_tag() + ss.str();
429  }
430 
431 }; // class BlkTsrEngine
432

438 template <typename Array, typename Scalar, typename Result>
439 class ScalBlkTsrEngine
440  : public BlkTsrEngineBase<ScalBlkTsrEngine<Array, Scalar, Result> > {
441  public:
442  // Class hierarchy typedefs
443  typedef ScalBlkTsrEngine<Array, Scalar, Result>
444  ScalBlkTsrEngine_;
445  typedef BlkTsrEngineBase<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>
446  BlkTsrEngineBase_;
447  typedef typename BlkTsrEngineBase_::LeafEngine_
448  LeafEngine_;
449  typedef typename LeafEngine_::ExprEngine_
450  ExprEngine_;
451 
452  // Argument typedefs
453  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::array_type
454  array_type;
455 
456  // Operational typedefs
457  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::value_type
458  value_type;
459  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::scalar_type
460  scalar_type;
461  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::op_base_type
462  op_base_type;
463  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::op_type
464  op_type;
465  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::policy
466  policy;
467  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::dist_eval_type
468  dist_eval_type;
469 
470  // Meta data typedefs
471  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::size_type
472  size_type;
473  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::trange_type
474  trange_type;
475  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::shape_type
476  shape_type;
477  typedef typename EngineTrait<ScalBlkTsrEngine_>::pmap_interface
478  pmap_interface;
479 
480  protected:
481  // Import base class variables to this scope
482  using BlkTsrEngineBase_::lower_bound_;
483  using BlkTsrEngineBase_::upper_bound_;
484  using ExprEngine_::perm_;
485  using ExprEngine_::permute_tiles_;
486  using ExprEngine_::pmap_;
487  using ExprEngine_::shape_;
488  using ExprEngine_::trange_;
489  using ExprEngine_::vars_;
490  using ExprEngine_::world_;
491  using LeafEngine_::array_;
492 
493  scalar_type factor_;
494 
495  public:
496  template <typename A, typename S>
497  ScalBlkTsrEngine(const ScalBlkTsrExpr<A, S>& expr)
498  : BlkTsrEngineBase_(expr), factor_(expr.factor()) {}
499 
501 
503  shape_type make_shape() {
504  return array_.shape().block(lower_bound_, upper_bound_, factor_);
505  }
506 
508 
511  shape_type make_shape(const Permutation& perm) {
512  return array_.shape().block(lower_bound_, upper_bound_, factor_, perm);
513  }
514 
516 
518  op_type make_tile_op() const {
519  const unsigned int rank = trange_.tiles_range().rank();
520 
521  // Construct and allocate memory for the shift range
522  std::vector<long> range_shift;
523  range_shift.reserve(rank);
524 
525  // Get temporary data pointers
526  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const trange = array_.trange().data().data();
527  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = lower_bound_.data();
528 
529  // Construct the inverse permutation
530  for (unsigned int d = 0u; d < rank; ++d) {
531  const auto lower_d = lower[d];
532  const auto base_d = trange[d].tile(lower_d).first;
533  range_shift.emplace_back(-base_d);
534  }
535 
536  return op_type(op_base_type(range_shift, factor_));
537  }
538 
540 
543  op_type make_tile_op(const Permutation& perm) const {
544  const unsigned int rank = trange_.tiles_range().rank();
545 
546  // Construct and allocate memory for the shift range
547  std::vector<long> range_shift(rank, 0l);
548 
549  // Get temporary data pointers
550  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const trange = array_.trange().data().data();
551  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = lower_bound_.data();
552 
553  // Initialize the permuted range shift vector
554  for (unsigned int d = 0u; d < rank; ++d) {
555  const auto perm_d = perm[d];
556  const auto lower_d = lower[d];
557  const auto base_d = trange[d].tile(lower_d).first;
558  range_shift[perm_d] = -base_d;
559  }
560 
561  return op_type(op_base_type(range_shift, factor_), perm);
562  }
563 
565 
567  std::string make_tag() const {
568  std::stringstream ss;
569  ss << "[block] [" << factor_ << "] ";
570  return BlkTsrEngineBase_::make_tag() + ss.str();
571  }
572 
573 }; // class ScalBlkTsrEngine
